{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:17.359

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:21.279
    | text      = The deep state is a conspiracy theory.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:38.200

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = by people that we elect by the Congress or the president.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:51.799

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:56.359
    | text      = the Securities and Exchange Commission, the IRS.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:00.839

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:05.880
    | text      = Yes, they're called regulations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:08.720
    | text      = I understand that McAfee is a real hard-nosed libertarian
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:18.279

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:36.440

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:43.759

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:23.880

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:29.599

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:31.960
    | text      = They're put in for five-year terms.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:34.079

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:39.279

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:41.480

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:44.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:45.279
    | text      = but it would be a really big deal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:47.599

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:49.640
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:50.480
    | text      = The SEC is supposed to remain very independent,

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:52.640
    | text      = seeing as they're tasked with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:53.680

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:55.519
    | text      = so it would be best not to allow people

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:57.240

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:58.720
    | text      = where they could fire them without a really good reason.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:00.839

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:04.160

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:06.319

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:08.720
    | text      = the SEC to be independent of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:10.559
    | text      = Yeah, it's something that you'd really need
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:13.319
    | text      = to try to create safeguards against
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:16.640
    | text      = the appearance of impropriety.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:17.960
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:18.799
    | text      = And so a president willy-nilly firing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:20.880
    | text      = an SEC commissioner would be, eh, it'd be dicey.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:24.720
    | text      = Imagine if you were a senator
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:26.319
    | text      = with early information that a pandemic was coming
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:29.720
    | text      = and you sold all of this stock before everything happened
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:33.880
    | text      = when it was still at a higher value.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:35.680
    | text      = That's something that the SEC would investigate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:38.160
    | text      = and take care of if they were an independent organization,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:41.160
    | text      = as we all know they are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:42.720
    | text      = The SEC is run by a board that is appointed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:44.960
    | text      = by the president who's elected and confirmed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:47.039
    | text      = by the Senate who are elected.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:48.680
    | text      = This is also an agency that's meant to be independent,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:50.759
    | text      = so it's widely understood that a president
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:52.480
    | text      = could not just randomly fire an FCC commissioner,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:55.720
    | text      = but an interesting article from 2014 in Politico
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:58.519
    | text      = brought up a way that a president could still work
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:01.000
    | text      = to shape FCC policy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:03.200
    | text      = While it's accepted that Obama could not fire

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:05.359
    | text      = the FCC chair if he disagreed on policy,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:07.920
    | text      = Zephyr Teachout made an argument
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:09.799
    | text      = that he could still remove the chair from that position
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:12.599
    | text      = and replace them with one of the other commissioners.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:15.480
    | text      = This would keep the same board intact,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:17.160
    | text      = but still shake up the power dynamics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:19.400
    | text      = So while there's good reason that a president
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:21.039
    | text      = should not have the sole authority
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:22.359
    | text      = to mold independent agencies to their will,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:25.160
    | text      = there's still things that can be done to effect change.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:28.680
    | text      = The IRS is run by a commissioner
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:30.960
    | text      = who's also appointed by the president who's elected
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:32.920
    | text      = and confirmed by the Senate who are elected.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:35.319
    | text      = I've seen some arguments that suggest
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:37.319
    | text      = that a president can actually fire the IRS commissioner
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:40.279
    | text      = and a lot of conservatives are really pissed off
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:42.200
    | text      = that Trump didn't do just that during his term
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:44.559
    | text      = when John Koskin was in that position.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:47.599
    | text      = Similarly, there are now calls
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:49.079
    | text      = for Biden to fire Charles Reddick,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:50.839
    | text      = who's the most recent person to fill the role
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:52.799
    | text      = being appointed by Trump in 2018.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:55.279
    | text      = Neither commissioner was or has been fired
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:57.359
    | text      = and the reason again is probably
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:58.559
    | text      = that doing something like that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:59.599
    | text      = requires a really strong justification
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:01.920
    | text      = or else it'll just look like severe corruption.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:05.000
    | text      = The idea that the government is secretly run
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:06.880
    | text      = by these unelected people is a popular refrain
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:09.000
    | text      = among folks like McAfee, but it fails to take into account
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
